entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
